Features

This table shows what features are supported for each platform.

WindowsmacOSLinuxFreeBSDWebAndroid*1iOS*1
Graphics
YesYesYesYesYesYesYes
WindowYesYesYesYesN/AN/AN/A
KeyboardYesYesYesYesYesYesNo*2
MouseYesYesYesYesYesNoNo
GamepadYesYesYesNoYesYesYes
TouchNo*3No*3No*3No*3YesYesYes
AudioYesYesYesYesYesYesYes
  • *1 It is assumed to use ebitenmobile command on mobile platforms.
  • *2 Planned to be supported in the future (Issue #1090)
  • *3 Issue #1013
